keyword: how many calories in a glass of prosecco
title: How Many Calories in a Glass of Prosecco?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a glass of prosecco (125 ml serving), including carbs, alcohol content, and nutrition breakdowns for dry brut style.
h1: How Many Calories in a Glass of Prosecco?
assumptions: Standard 125 ml pour of brut (dry) prosecco, ~11% ABV, no added mixers or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, sweetness level (brut vs. extra dry), ABV, and serving size. Check bottle labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 125 ml glass of brut prosecco contains about 90 kcal, mostly from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add a splash of soda water (zero-cal mixer)

faqs.q: How many calories in a glass of prosecco?
faqs.a: About 90 kcal for a standard 125 ml glass of brut prosecco.
Yes, brut prosecco has ~2 g carbs per 125 ml glass, mostly sugars.

faqs.q: How does prosecco compare to champagne calories?
faqs.a: Similar; a 125 ml glass of brut champagne is also ~90 kcal.
Sweetness level (brut lowest, demi-sec highest), serving size, and ABV.
Approximately 72 kcal per 100 ml for brut style.
